# @nareshkosal/split-display

Interactive WebGL video panels built with react-three-fiber.

## Installation

```bash
# Using npm
npx @nareshkosal/split-display

# Using pnpm
pnpm dlx @nareshkosal/split-display

# Using yarn
yarn dlx @nareshkosal/split-display
```
